name: Black Clutch
description: Black leather clutch with Zwarovski crystal details ensure you carry your things and yourself with confidence.

name: Floral Bag
description: White leather with deep hand-printed blue flowers make this stand out in a crowd.

description: Color coordinated boot and bag set keeps you ready to meet your friends out and about.

name: Silver Collection
description: This collection of sterling silver jewelry gives you a full collection of accessories appropriate for any and every occassion.

name: Titanium Watch
description: Never worry about a broken watch again with this titanium made watch. Safe up to 40 feet underwatch and impact resistant, this watch is stylish and sturdy.
